topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1 Beta: Specifying a Primary Project for a User

body.p: When you create a user account, you must assign the account to a primary project. The primary project is simply the first project the user is associated with and must exist prior to creating the user.
Optionally, you can assign the account to additional projects. Before you can delete a user account, you must remove the user account from its primary project.
As an admin, you can specify a primary project for each user.

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.
Click the Identity dashboard, then the Users panel.
In the Users table, for the user you want to delete, click Edit User.
In the Update User screen, select a project from the Primary Project list.
